about.title: About Me
about.description: I’m a passionate frontend developer and graphic designer focused on creating unique and engaging digital experiences. My blend of technical and creative skills allows me to approach projects from a comprehensive perspective, ensuring results that not only work well but also look great.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Do you have a project in mind? I’d love to collaborate with you!
